title: Collusion tough because cheating firm benefits

content.description: There are four firms in an oligopolistic industry. The four firms agree to collude and act like a monopoly.
content.question: If one of the firms violates the agreement and charges a lower price or sells a larger quantity than what was agreed to, what will happen in the short run?

choices.label: The firm that cheats will earn higher profits, and industry profits will be lower.
The firm that cheats will earn higher profits, and industry profits will be higher.
The firm that cheats will earn lower profits, and industry profits will be lower.
The firm that cheats will earn lower profits, and industry profits will be higher.
The firms that do not cheat will earn higher profits.

content.answer: The firm that cheats will earn higher profits, and industry profits will be lower.

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
